name: Silinsky et ux., Appellants v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Silinsky et ux., Appellants v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The order of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Francis Shunk Brown, Jr.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Theodore Voorhees, with him Philip Price, Barnes, Dechert, Price, Smith & Ciarle, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Silinsky et ux., Appellants v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company.
Argued December 4, 1946.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Charles Edwin Wallington, for appellants.
Theodore Voorhees, with him Philip Price, Barnes, Dechert, Price, Smith & Ciarle, for appellee.
January 6, 1947:
